item.title: Joana Vasconcelos: Beyond | Yorkshire Sculpture Park
item.description: Joana Vasconcelos (and her workshop) makes big, brash works that make up for in spectacle what they lack in subtlety. She’s taken over an indoors gallery and an outdoor section of the fabulous Yorkshire Sculpture Park, near Wakefield. I saw this show on a lovely sunny Sunday, and ate it up like an ice cream with extra sprinkles and a flake. Or maybe a pastel de nata? A major theme of Vasconcelos’ work is Portugueseness, and she takes a typically more-is-more approach to her ancestral homeland.
